pages.text: $(item)Plastic/$ is an important crafting component in $(pncr).$(p)$(item)Liquid Plastic/$ is made from $(l:manufacturing/refinery)LPG/$ and $(item)Coal/$ in the $(l:manufacturing/thermopneumatic_processing_plant)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$.

pages.title: Solid Plastic
pages.text: $(item)Liquid Plastic/$ can then be mixed with $(item)dyes/$ in a $(l:manufacturing/plastic_mixer)Plastic Mixer/$ and solidified into colored $(item)Plastic/$ sheets.$(p)Note that when you're $(italic)solidifying/$ plastic, you don't need to provide the $(item)Plastic Mixer/$ with any $(l:base_concepts/heat)heat/$.
